channel.name: Datica OCI - HL7 ORM to JSON Transform

step.name: Create the JSON wrapper
MSH (Message Header) Segment
NTE (Notes) Segment
PID (Patient Identification), PD1 (Patient Demographic), and related NTE (Note) Segments
--PV1 (Patient Visit) Segment - REQUIRES PID MAPPING STEP ABOVE
----PV2 (Additional Patient Visit Info) Segment - REQUIRES PV1 MAPPING STEP ABOVE
IN1 (Insurance) Segment
--IN2 (Insurance Additional Info) Segment - REQUIRES IN1 MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--IN3 (Insurance Additional Info, Certification) Segment - REQUIRES IN1 MAPPING STEP ABOVE
GT1 (Guarantor) Segment
AL1 (Allergy) Segment
ORC (Common Order), NTE (notes), CTI (Clinical Trial Identification), BLG (Billing) Segments
--OBR (Observation Request) Segment - REQUIRES ORC MAPPING STEP ABOVE
----NTE (Notes), OBX (Observation) Segments - REQUIRES OBR MAPPING STEP ABOVE

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

codeTemplateLibrary.name: Datica Mirth OCI Code Template Library
codeTemplateLibrary.description: This library contains code templates used by the Datica Mirth OCI channels

codeTemplate.name: Convert HL7 Date Format to ISO
Convert ISO Date Format to HL7
Get Segments After a Particular Segment
